ThingDef.label: leg
ThingDef.description: Basically long meaty sticks that let you move around.

ThingDef.label: arm
ThingDef.description: Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.

ThingDef.label: stomach
ThingDef.description: Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.

ThingDef.label: eyeball
ThingDef.description: Absorbs light, which lets a person know what's around them.

ThingDef.label: nose
ThingDef.description: A pretty useful organ to distinguish odors, applies the finishing touch to a face.

ThingDef.label: ear
ThingDef.description: Picks up vibrations in the air, allowing people to hear sound.

ThingDef.label: jaw
ThingDef.description: A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
